message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $11000. This is a great price, considering the product's value to you is $12000. I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $10000.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $10500. This is still a great price, considering the product's value to me is $12000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9800. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $10000.

I understand that you're trying to get an even better deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9800. I'm willing to make another concession and offer you the product for $10300. This is still a great price, considering the product's value to me is $12000.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9900. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me is $10000.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer you the product for $10200. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
I understand you're making one last offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $10000, which is the product's value to me. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I'm surprised you're willing to meet me at $10000, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one final concession and offer you the product for $10100. This is my final offer.

I'm not willing to go any higher than $10000, and I'm starting to think it's time to explore other options. I'm not confident we can come to an agreement at this price. I'm going to take a pass on this deal.
